    • Constructor Detail

      • Selectable

        public Selectable(Tile tile,
                  Game controller,
                  javafx.scene.paint.Color hover,
                  javafx.scene.paint.Color ring,
                  javafx.scene.paint.Color solid,
                  javafx.scene.paint.Color castle)
        Constructs a selectable that can perform moves on GUI action, or perform moves programmatically
        Parameters:
        tile, - the tile selectable is on
        controller, - controller to redirect flow back to
        hover, - color of hover
        ring, - color of ring
        solid, - color of selectable
        castle, - color of castle ring
